Num.FuncTxt: local value = 5 local abil = GetAbility(self, 'Hermit8') if abil ~= nil and TryGetProp(abil, 'ActiveState', 0) == 1 then value = 1 end return value;

Str.FuncTxt: local buff = "None" if IsBuffApplied(self, "FlowOfSpace_Buff") == "NO" then buff = "AttractionOfTheMoon_Buff" end return buff

Num.FuncTxt: local value = 5 value = GET_PVP_TARGET_COUNT(self, value) return value
